graph.original_query: MAke a website landing page that looks like the attached image.

design_elements.layout: Clean, modern layout with a hero section, clear navigation, and prominent call-to-action buttons. Uses white space effectively. Features a full-width image section towards the bottom.

descriptions: Transform your construction site with AI-powered real-time monitoring, 3D scanning, and actionable insights. From site scanning to BIM creation, Observance delivers the intelligence you need to improve project outcomes.
other_text_elements: Navigation links: Home, About, Product, Our Solutions, Services, Team, Pricing, Contact, Blog

ui_components: Hero section with headline and description

globals_schema.execution_result_T002: Created a complete HTML structure and corresponding CSS styles for the landing page based on the design summary.

code_profile.structure: Standard HTML structure with header, navigation, hero section, full-width image section, and footer.
styling_techniques: CSS reset to remove default browser styles
Basic color scheme and font selection
code_profile.purpose: Basic landing page layout with responsive design.
key_components: Navigation bar with links and a demo button
Hero section with a heading and introductory text
Full-width image section for visual appeal

analysis.content_summary: Screenshot of a website for 'Observance', a construction site monitoring platform.
key_elements: Website header with logo, navigation menu, and demo button
Hero section with the headline 'Observance measures while you construct!'
Short description of the platform's capabilities (AI-powered real-time monitoring, 3D scanning, BIM creation)
Website screenshot displaying user interface of a dashboard
analysis.sample_content: Screenshot of a web page. Contains images, text and graphical elements. It's a marketing material for 'Observance'

file_profiles.summary: PNG file containing a website screenshot marketing 'Observance', a construction site monitoring platform.

limitations: Could not access the file directly to determine the file size and resolution

recommendations: Access the file to gather more accurate information

nodes.description: Extract key design elements and content from the Observance website screenshot.

nodes.description: Translate the website design summary into a detailed HTML/CSS structure.
nodes.agent_prompt: Based on the website design summary in `website_design_summary_T001`, create a complete HTML structure and corresponding CSS styles to replicate the landing page. Use modern HTML5 semantic tags and CSS3 for layout and styling. Ensure the design is responsive and adapts to different screen sizes. Include all necessary HTML and CSS code in a single output. DO NOT include any Javascript.
